SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveActor
Base class for all active entities in the game, providing movement and image setup.
ActiveActorDestructible
Extends ActiveActor, adding destructible functionality for actors.
ActorManager
Manages all active actors (enemies, projectiles, etc.) in a level.
Boss
Implements the boss logic, including shields and movement patterns.
BossProjectile
Represents projectiles fired by the boss.
CollisionManager
Handles collision detection between actors.
Controller
Handles game state transitions between levels.
Destructible
Interface defining destructible entities.
EnemyPlane
Represents enemy fighter planes.
EnemyProjectile
Represents projectiles fired by enemies.
FighterPlane
Abstract base class for all fighter planes (player and enemies).
GameConstants
Contains global constants used throughout the game.
GameOverImage
Displays the game-over screen with an image.
GameOverUI
Represents the game-over UI, including an image and buttons for returning to the main menu or restarting the game.
HeartDisplay
Manages and displays player health using heart icons.
HomingProjectile
A homing projectile that tracks its target but includes deviation for dodgeability.
LevelBackgroundManager
Manages the level's background, including resizing and scrolling.
LevelGameStateManager
Manages level transitions and game states (win/lose).
LevelOne
Implements the first level's logic, including enemy spawning, health tracking, and game-over mechanics.
LevelParent
Refactored LevelParent class using modular components.
LevelParentBase
Base class for shared level functionality.
LevelThree
Implements the third level's logic, including boss mechanics.
LevelTwo
Implements Level Two logic with tougher enemies and win conditions.
LevelView
Manages the main level UI, such as health and win/loss screens.
LevelViewLevelThree
Extends LevelView to add boss-specific UI elements for Level Three.
Main
Main class for the Sky Battle application.
MainMenu
Creates the main menu screen for the game.
Projectile
Base class for all projectiles.
ShieldImage
Represents a shield image with health for the boss.
UserPlane
The player-controlled fighter plane.
UserProjectile
Represents projectiles fired by the player.
UserSettings
A utility class to manage user settings for the game.
WindowUtils
A utility class for managing window and display settings for the application.
WinImage
Displays the victory screen with a win image.
